product.name: Bronzer - pressed
product.description: Our bronzer has been enhanced with Fruits, Botanicals and Clays for their natural color, fragrance and antioxidant benefits! Blended with Certified Organics Fruits and Botanicals Formulated with common skin irritants. Our bronzer will offer a natural 'ultra sheer' semi-matte finish. Made without any gluten containing ingredients VEGAN! Eco Friendly jars!
